Author: pyrehoula
Text: I’m sorry you had that dream and you’re having these awful feelings. 😞  Don’t fast, don’t “flush” if you absolutely must purge, monitor your electrolytes, stay hydrated but not overhydrated, keep some sort of sugary candy on you at all times in case of emergencies, and be extremely careful with drugs/medications and alcohol. Do all of this and the only way you’ll get sectioned is if you tell people too much about your ED.
